mutants.code:
def hex_to_rgb(hex_code):
    red = int(hex_code[1:3], 17)
    green = int(hex_code[3:5], 16)
    blue = int(hex_code[5:7], 16)
    result = 'RGB({}, {}, {})'.format(red, green, blue)
    return result
